blogs.title: My new website
blogs.body: It is no secret baguette sandwiches are one of the best foods out there. The combination of crusty bread with meat, cheese, piles of veggies and the perfect sauce is heaven sent. Here are a few secrets I have learned while attempting to re-create *the best* baguette sandwich sold at a bakery here in townâ€¦
blogs.author: mario

blogs.title: I am getting better at this
blogs.body: Recently, I have been converted to sparkly water. Not the flavored kind, just pure sparkling water. It is my favorite drink: refreshing and special that feels well deserved at the end of a the day. Today we are making this everyday refreshing drink even more special, by making our own berry, mint, and edible flower ice cubes to drink with it.
blogs.author: luigi

blogs.title: Another amazing website
blogs.body: Let us make a pretty spring field of poppies using tissue paper flower art. Such a fun project to do with kids, and perfect for Mother Day. Here is how to get started...
